functional.notes: Bundle manifest is deterministic with sorted entries and stable schema version.
evidence: pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/bundle.py build_manifest_v1() sorts outputs and produces a stable dict.
pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/cli.py validate emits manifest JSON with stable formatting.
findings: Manifest ordering is stable across runs on the same inputs.
Schema version is explicit and validated.

correctness_safety.notes: Determinism reduces audit noise and supports reproducible evidence.
findings: Regression coverage exists for ordering drift.

performance.notes: Sorting overhead is negligible given small output sets.
findings: No heavy IO beyond reading existing outputs.

security.notes: Manifest contains only file metadata and paths.

maintainability.notes: Manifest logic is isolated and test-backed.

summary.notes: Looks solid; ensure sha256 computation (if any) remains optional and deterministic.
